scenario.name: The Norman Conquest
scenario.description: England stands at a crossroads. King Edward the Confessor has died without an heir, and three claimants vie for the throne: Harold Godwinson crowned in haste, William Duke of Normandy claiming Edward's promise, and Harald Hardrada of Norway asserting ancient rights. The fate of England will be decided by sword and shield.

playable_nations.description: Newly crowned King Harold faces invasions from both Norway and Normandy
Duke William claims the English throne through Edward's alleged promise
The legendary Viking king seeks to reclaim England for Scandinavia
Watch and wait as England tears itself apart, then strike
A young king struggles to control his powerful vassals

scripted_events.description: The Battle of Stamford Bridge - Harold's army meets the Norwegian invasion
The Battle of Hastings - William's invasion force lands in Sussex
